content:
Paris in November can be a lovely time to visit, with fewer tourists and a more local atmosphere. And, of course, an Eiffel Tower view is a must-have for many travelers!

I'd be happy to help you find some hotels with an Eiffel Tower view within your budget. Before we dive in, could you please share some more details with me?

1. What is your budget per night for the hotel?
2. Are you looking for a specific location in Paris (e.g., Champs-Élysées, Montmartre, Latin Quarter)?
3. What type of accommodation are you interested in (e.g., luxury, boutique, mid-range, budget-friendly)?
4. Are there any specific amenities you're looking for in a hotel (e.g., breakfast included, fitness center, spa)?

As for your Hilton points, that's a great perk! You can definitely use them for a separate trip to Las Vegas. Hilton has several properties on the Las Vegas Strip, including the Hilton Grand Vacations Club on the Boulevard and the Waldorf Astoria Las Vegas. You can explore their website to find the perfect fit for your trip.

Once I have a better understanding of your preferences, I can provide you with some personalized hotel recommendations in Paris with an Eiffel Tower view that fit your budget.
